job.title: Junior Site Reliability Engineer-Citi Technology Infrastructure
job.description: Job Id: 21267690We are looking for a motivated Junior Site Reliability Engineer who prefers to live on the cutting edge of cloud infrastructure management, Application Performance Management (APM), and Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC).An ideal candidate would have both software engineering experience as well as DevOps/Sysadmin experience however we are open to anyone passionate about creating organized, efficient, and scalable cloud infrastructure which is easy to deploy and maintain.Responsibilities:Provision new infrastructure and monitor existing oneSet up automated mechanisms that spot issues earlyConfigure alarms and alerts to find any performance issuesAssist the team with technology selectionFront-line for Production monitoring + response in case of issuesWorks on the design of new features / functionality to ensure Security + Resiliency + Monitoring are baked into every release.Works with the team on releasesQualifications:1 year of experience as SRE, software engineer, or systems administratorComfortable working with Docker / ContainersExperience with coding in any languageContinuous Integration / Continuous Delivery and APM implementation experienceConsistently demonstrates clear and concise written and verbal communicationDemonstrated problem-solving and decision-making skillsAbility to work under pressure and manage deadlines or unexpected changes in expectations or requirementsEducation:Bachelor’s degree/University degree or equivalent experienceThis job description provides a high-level review of the types of work performed.
